definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Umm, it was my freshman year. It was the first semester, so I came back.
sentences.chinese: 那时是大一的第一学期。等再开学，

sentences.english: So after the school starts, there are studies at the evening.
sentences.chinese: 所以开学之后晚上还有晚自习。

sentences.english: The first day of school our professor introduced a little old lady to us.
sentences.chinese: 开学第一天，教授把一位小个子老太太介绍给了我们。

sentences.english: Full-Semester Refund available within first 2 weeks of Spring Semester.
sentences.chinese: 开学兩周内，可申请一学期全额退款。

sentences.english: This is the first day of this semester and welcome to reback to school.
sentences.chinese: 今天是开学的第一天，欢迎大家重回学校。

sentences.english: At 3 o'clock in the afternoon, the opening ceremony started.
sentences.chinese: 级新生开学典礼正式开始。

sentences.english: The "Admission Notice" will be sent to the admitted applicants two weeks before registration.
sentences.chinese: 申请获准入学者将在开学注册前二周通知。

sentences.english: N. 1. Assigns seating on the first day of school.
sentences.chinese: 开学第一天把座位排好。

sentences.english: On the first day, all of the new students attended an assembly in the school hall.
sentences.chinese: 开学第一天，所有的新生都去学校礼堂参加晨会。

sentences.english: Will there be classwork and homework on the first day?
sentences.chinese: 开学第一天会有随堂作业和课外作业吗？

sentences.english: Students and guests at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 学员们和到场嘉宾在开学典礼上合影。
今天是本学期正式开学的第一天。

sentences.english: I mean school will open on September 2nd.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是9月2日就要开学了。

sentences.english: Day of firm opening mass organizations when, encounter there is a student to send the handbill on the road.
sentences.chinese: 刚开学社团日的时候，遇到路上有学生发传单。

sentences.english: It will be a month before the new term starts, so it would be better for me to take some parttime jobs.
sentences.chinese: 距离开学还有一个月，不如找点兼职充实自我。

sentences.english: Only then begins school, is hit by the assistant squad leader, finally class leader helps him to pay the medical expenses.
sentences.chinese: 才开学的时候，被副班长打，结果班长帮他付医药费。

definition: to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
third year in junior middle school
junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to go to school/to attend school
